agent_utterance: Nice work staying connected today. Tonight, try a tiny, easy post-dinner option: pick a simple, single-serve snack you can prepare quickly (for example, an apple or a small handful of berries) and drink a glass of water. Then pause for a brief moment to check your fullness and decide if you truly want more. Keep it simple, and log how you feel after the snack to reinforce your progress.
agent_monologue: Brief rationale: to support steady progress for someone who values structure and is sensitive to evening cues, introduce a tiny, non-judgmental micro-step that buys time, reinforces mindful choice, and fits smoothly into an already structured routine.
